messages.title: Standing up for Romford
messages.content: Andrew Rosindell M.P. is your local champion, standing up for the people of Romford.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: It's time to get Brexit done and move our country forward.

issues.brexitEurope: Get Brexit Done. Unleash Britain's Potential.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am first and foremost a community champion for Romford...

politicalExperience.achievements: Delivering for Britain and our local community

endorsements.endorsement: Andrew Rosindell is a dedicated champion for Romford...

quotes.text: Andrew Rosindell is a truly dedicated champion for Romford in Parliament.

images.caption: Andrew Rosindell with supporters and his campaign material.
